NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: Oops! the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

hero.title: Discover local businesses & services in your city
hero.subtitle: Connect with the best local businesses and services in your city, schedule appointments with just a few clicks.

search.title: Find the perfect business
search.description: Search by business name, service, or browse through categories to find what you need

featuredBusiness.title: Featured Businesses
featuredBusiness.description: Discover our top-rated businesses with excellent customer reviews

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Simple step to connect with businesses and schedule appointments

step1.title: Search
step1.description: Find businesses by name, category, or location to discover services that meet your needs.

step2.title: Compare
step2.description: View business profiles, services, prices, and ratings from other users.

step3.title: Book
step3.description: Schedule appointments directly through our platform with real-time availability.

forBusiness.title: For business owners
forBusiness.description: Join our platform to increase your online presence and manage appointments in one place.
list: Increase your online presence and get more clients.
Manage appointments and bookings in one place.
Showcase reviews and build your reputation online.
Access analytics and insights about your costumers.

categories.title: Browse by category
categories.description: Explore business across various categories to find exactly what you need.
